name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Church of Jesus Christ Site Side by Side

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Read the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints website in up to 4 different languages side by side.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This app allows language learners to study spiritual content in up to 4 different languages side-by-side from the churchofjesuschrist.org website. Just hover over a paragraph or verse of scripture and all of the browser windows will stay in sync and scroll with you.
